alert.note: Alert for Northern Oneida (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Lake Effect Snow Warning issued January 17 at 3:34AM EST until January 17 at 5:00AM EST by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...LAKE EFFECT SNOW WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM EST EARLY THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Heavy lake effect snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to two inches over far northern Oneida County. Storm totals of 5 to 10 inches, with locally 1 foot near the Florence area. * WHERE...Northern Oneida county. * WHEN...Until 5 AM EST early this morning. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The snow band will lift north and exit the area before daybreak.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
